MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the EH1 and EH3 postcode areas of Glasgow, affecting properties in Barony street and surrounding streets. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 12.22pm. Our engineers have arrived on site at the Broughton Place substation and are investigating the cause of the fault.  Our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 3.30pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 1.10pm on the 15th October 2020.
